about_the_game:
A new sensation!? City-building × Roguelike game *Super Tax City*.
Choose and place your favorite facilities from randomly drawn options!
The combinations are endless! Create a profitable city that's uniquely yours!

About the demo version

This is the demo version of 'Super Tax City.'
You can experience some of the facilities, items, and stages.
Even with just the demo version, there's plenty of fun to be had!

Rules


Choose a facility from three options and place it on the map!


When randomly moving residents enter a facility, they perform tasks and earn rewards!


When the time limit expires, it's tax time.
Pay your taxes with the money you've earned!

About the Facilities

A number of unique facilities with distinctive effects are featured!

About the items

Enhance your city even further with items!


The combinations are endless! Create a profitable city that's uniquely yours!

Streaming Guidelines

1) You are free to stream and upload gameplay videos without prior notice, regardless of whether you are an individual or corporation, and regardless of whether your activities are for profit or not.
2) If possible, please include the URL of the Steam page in the description.
3) We take no responsibility for any damages that may occur as a result of streaming this game. Additionally, the content of these guidelines may be changed without prior notice.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Graphics: 4,096 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
